title: BRIEF-Adtalem Global Education Says Will Seek To Refinance Existing Credit Agreement, Dated March 31, 2015
text: March 26, 2018 / 12:16 PM / Updated 5 minutes ago BRIEF-Adtalem Global Education Says Will Seek To Refinance Existing Credit Agreement, Dated March 31, 2015 Reuters Staff 1 Min Read March 26 (Reuters) - Adtalem Global Education Inc: * ADTALEM GLOBAL EDUCATION SAYS COMPANY WILL SEEK TO REFINANCE ITS EXISTING CREDIT AGREEMENT, DATED AS OF MARCH 31, 2015 - SEC FILING * ADTALEM GLOBAL EDUCATION INC - EXPECTS NEW FACILITIES WILL PROVIDE A REVOLVING CREDIT COMMITMENT FOR $300 MILLION AND A SEVEN-YEAR TERM LOAN OF $300 MILLION * ADTALEM GLOBAL EDUCATION- PROCEEDS FROM NEW FACILITIES WILL BE USED BY COTO REPAY ITS OUTSTANDING $165 MILLION BALANCE ON EXISTING FACILITY, OTHERS Source text: ( bit.ly/2IVgVzp ) Further company coverage:
